<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Start a Container Scan</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v32.07/containers/scan"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"monitorImages"}
```



Re-scan all containers immediately.
This endpoint returns the time that the scans were initiated.

The following example command uses curl and basic auth to force Prisma Cloud Compute to re-scan all containers:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X POST \
  https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/containers/scan
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"default"} value={"default"}><div></div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
